verbose_text: Monocytes have a direct and dual role in coagulation by producing important cofactors for FX (FV, FVIII and FXIIIA), but additional regulation is provided through the production of thrombomodulin, which destabilizes fibrin clots XREF_BIBR, impairs platelet function XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR and activates the anticoagulant protein C pathway.
